summary: Email correspondence between a detective from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding Jeffrey Epstein case coordination and attached reports, scheduling a call before a Wednesday event.

events.title: Email coordination on Epstein case

personsInvolved: Detective NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force
Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: Email correspondence shows ongoing coordination between NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force and the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the Epstein investigation in December 2018.
Attachments include 'DAS search.pdf', 'Event_Detail_-_Parking_Summons.pdf', and 'Event_Detail_-_SOMU.pdf', suggesting evidentiary materials were being shared.
Reference to preparation for 'Wednesday' indicates an upcoming legal event or deadline related to the Epstein case.
The detective provides 'SOMU records' (possibly Special Operations Management Unit or similar law enforcement records) related to Epstein.
